hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BLL_BUILD_NUMBER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is used to pass a common build number to all IL and BLL build jobs run during the nightly build process.

scm.projectOptions: noallwrite clobber nocompress unlocked nomodtime rmdir

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
# -- setup build number and path based on the branch name if [ "$BRANCH_NAME" = "integration" ]; then export BRANCH_ID='3' fi
export FULL_BUILD=${STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION}.${BLL_BUILD_NUMBER}${BRANCH_ID} export MARTIN_TAR_DIR=/mnt/gibson/TestCenter/${STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION}/Engineering_Builds/GUI_BLL/${FULL_BUILD}/tar
# -- copy the tar balls from martin rm -f Spirent_TestCenter_LS_${STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION}.tar.gz rm -f Spirent_TestCenter_Auto_Linux_${STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION}.tar.gz cp ${MARTIN_TAR_DIR}/Spirent_TestCenter_LS_${STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION}.tar.gz $WORKSPACE # cp ${MARTIN_TAR_DIR}/Spirent_TestCenter_Auto_Linux_${STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION}.tar.gz $WORKSPACE
# Re-structure LS tar ball according to the requirement for LS VM # tar xvfz Spirent_TestCenter_LS_${STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION}.tar.gz # cp stcapi_linux/stcapi_linux*.*gz ./Spirent_TestCenter_Application_Linux_Server/ # mv Spirent_TestCenter_Auto_Linux_${STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION}.tar.gz ./Spirent_TestCenter_Application_Linux_Server/ # rm -f Spirent_TestCenter_LS_${STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION}.tar.gz # tar cvfz Spirent_TestCenter_LS_${STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION}.tar.gz Spirent_TestCenter_Application_Linux_Server

#!/bin/bash
baseimg=$WORKSPACE/labServerBaseVm.img lstarball=$WORKSPACE/Spirent_TestCenter_LS_${STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION}.tar.gz echo "STC API Linux filename is $filename"
# -- mount the qcow image TmpDir=/tmp/vm Dev=/dev/nbd0 echo "Updating server $lstarball on image file: $baseimg" sudo modprobe nbd max_part=8 sudo qemu-nbd -d $Dev sudo qemu-nbd -c $Dev $baseimg mkdir -p $TmpDir echo "Device $Dev" # TODO Takes a bit to mount need to check if the device exists first sleep 5 # make sure the devices mounted sudo fdisk -l $Dev
# mount the qcow as a block device sudo mount /dev/nbd0p1 $TmpDir Dir=`pwd` # untar a version of the server pushd $TmpDir/home/stc sudo mv -f STC_SERVER OLD_SERVER sudo tar -z -x -v -f $lstarball -C $TmpDir/home/stc sudo mv Spirent_TestCenter_Application_Linux_Server STC_Server pushd STC_Server export filename=`ls | grep stcapi_linux*.tgz` popd sudo chown -R 500:500 STC_Server # sudo ln $TmpDir/home/stc/STC_Server/Spirent_TestCenter_Auto_Linux_${STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION}.tar.gz $TmpDir/tmp/Spirent_TestCenter_Auto_Linux_${STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION}.tar.gz sudo ln $TmpDir/home/stc/STC_Server/$filename $TmpDir/tmp/$filename sudo cp $WORKSPACE/stcapi $TmpDir/etc/init.d/stcapi sudo chmod a+x $TmpDir/etc/init.d/stcapi popd # Set vm to dhcp by default pushd $TmpDir/etc/sysconfig/network-scripts sudo echo -e "DEVICE=eth0
TYPE=Ethernet
NM_CONTROLLED=no
ONBOOT=yes
BOOTPROTO=dhcp
PEERDNS=yes" > /tmp/ifcfg-eth0.new sudo rm -f ifcfg-eth0 sudo mv /tmp/ifcfg-eth0.new ifcfg-eth0 sudo sudo chown root:root ifcfg-eth0 popd cd $WORKSPACE sudo umount $TmpDir sudo qemu-nbd -d $Dev gzip labServerBaseVm.img
